name: postgres
description: PostgreSQL database running in Docker with persistent data storage
author: Luna Team

fields.name: database
fields.label: Database Name
fields.help: Name of the default database to create

fields.name: password
fields.label: Password
fields.help: PostgreSQL password (will be stored in external_services/postgres/config.json)

commands.install: docker pull postgres:16-alpine || docker pull postgres:16 || docker pull postgres:latest
commands.uninstall: docker rm -f luna_postgres 2>/dev/null || true && docker volume rm luna_postgres_data 2>/dev/null || true
commands.start: docker run -d --name luna_postgres --restart unless-stopped -p {{port}}:5432 -e POSTGRES_DB={{database}} -e POSTGRES_USER={{user}} -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD={{password}} -v luna_postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data postgres:16
